sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Renewable Energy Facilities Agricultural Impact Mitigation Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Renewable Energy Facilities Agricultural Impact Mitigation Act.

sections.heading: Purpose.  The primary purpose of this Act is to promote the State's welfare by protecting landowners during the construction and deconstruction of commercial renewable energy facilities
sections.text: Purpose. The primary purpose of this Act is to promote the State's welfare by protecting landowners during the construction and deconstruction of commercial renewable energy facilities.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
